trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola seems eager to share your discoveries with the others.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Paushs Ooan.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_TODO_01<tab>Search for Grenoldt.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_TODO_02<tab>Approach Grenoldt and /psych him up.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_TODO_03<tab>Present something inspiring to Grenoldt.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>Thank you for assisting me with my investigations. I shall seek out our companions and share what we have learned.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>...Much as I would like to tell you to sit down and leave the rest to us, your condition demands that we make all reasonable haste.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_YSHTOLA_000_002<tab>If you are not too weary, it may be useful to speak with Paushs Ooan again, and ask if there is aught else he is willing to divulge.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_010<tab>Ah, Alphinaud's friend. You and your companions have done much to repair the damage caused when the waters parted...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_011<tab>...Anything elssse you can do? Hmmm... Have you been to the Walls of the Forgotten?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A1_000_001<tab>I...think I've just come from them.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A1_000_002<tab>Are they the ruins to the northwest?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_012<tab>The remnants to the northwest, yesss? You visited them unbidden? Pshhh... Could it be that your footsteps were guided by the ancientsss...?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_013<tab>Yesss, that is the sacred site of which I ssspeak. Could it be that your footsssteps were guided there by the ancientsss...?

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_014<tab>I believe it may be ssso. Listen then, and I will tell you of our plans to bring light to the Walls, that we might answer the shining call of the illuminated land.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_015<tab>We have requested a finless craftsman to shape for us a sssacred lamp. He is odd for a land-dweller, choosing as he does to live in the ocean, but his ssskill is beyond question.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_016<tab>It is concerning, however, that we have heard nothing of his progress. If you were to visit this artisan and return with our long-awaited light, then any doubt as to your purpossse would be laid to ressst.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_017<tab>His name is “Grenoldt.” You will find his workshop in a metal structure to the sssouth.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_PAUSHSOOAN_000_020<tab>Go, visit Grenoldt in his “Workbench.” Bring back the lamp we asssked for, and all will be as the ancients desired.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_030<tab>Oh, that's just <var 1A 02 /var>great<var 1A 01 /var>, that is. Me mind's playin' tricks on me now. “Look, Grenoldt! Someone's come to visit ye <var 1A 02 /var>at the bottom o' the bleedin' ocean<var 1A 01 /var>!”
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_031<tab>Or might be as yer a ghost, eh? Go on, foul shade, feast yerself on me rotten soul...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_032<tab>I've got no use for it. A craftsman what can't craft is more pointless than a sea slug with a domin' hammer. An' that's an insult to bloody sea slugs...

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Grenoldt appears to be suffering from a crushing bout of self-doubt. Maybe you can help <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_040<tab>Worthless, that's what I am...

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Grenoldt appears to be suffering from a crushing bout of self-doubt. Maybe you can help <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>psych<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him up.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_042<tab>What is it ye want, specter? If yer not here to end me misery, then bugger off back to damnation...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_043<tab>...Eh? Ye wouldn't be tryin' to raise me spirits now, would ye, spirit? Not what ye'd expect from a servant o' the netherworld...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A2_000_001<tab>Has it really come to this...?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A2_000_002<tab>Have we met before?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A2_000_003<tab>Are you Grenoldt, then?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A2_000_004<tab>Have we met before?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_044<tab>...What's that supposed to mean? Not impressed with what ye see, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_045<tab>Aye, well...I may have let meself go a bit. This was meant to be me underwater sanctuary─a place where I could concentrate on me work, far from the distractions o' the outside world...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_046<tab>Er... Might be as we crossed paths back in the Crystarium, but I don't reckon we've been formally introduced.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_047<tab>Name's Grenoldt. An' this here's meant to be me underwater sanctuary─a place where I can give meself over to me work, far from the distractions o' the outside world...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_048<tab>Aye. Though I wonder how ye bloody well found me...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_049<tab>This here's meant to be me underwater sanctuary─a place where I can give meself over to me work, far from the distractions o' the outside world...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_050<tab>...An' yet, here ye stand. Now what's so damned important that ye'd dive all the way down to the bottom o' the bleedin' Tempest to bother me?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_051<tab>Ah... The Ondo's lamp...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_052<tab>Gods curse me empty head! I've not so much as made a start!

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_053<tab>I'm worth less than a sea slug... Nay, the <var 1A 02 /var>slime<var 1A 01 /var> left by a sea slug. Me delivery date's long past, me workbench is untouched... An' I call meself a bleedin' artisan!
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_054<tab>Ye've heard their beliefs, have ye? Bringin' light to them ruins'll be an act of <var 1A 02 /var>deep religious an' cultural significance<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_055<tab>An' it was my privilege as a craftsman to be tasked with providin' a ritual instrument worthy o' the occasion. But I just...can't...bloody well...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_056<tab>GAAAH! Me mind's a bleedin' blank! It's like I've pissed away me last drop of inspiration!
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_057<tab>Tell me ye've got summat to show me─summat as'll give me muse a right good kick up the arse...?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_058<tab>The Ondo want to honor the comin' o' these ancients, so their answerin' light's got to blaze with the right kind o' brightness.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_059<tab>Like...like the spark o' life caught in a crystal. But just bein' sparkly's not enough─it's got to dance with joy an' sorrow an' a sense o' hardship endured... Ye know what I mean!?

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Your thoughts turn to the Warriors of Light from the First, and the crystals you discovered at the end of their journeys. Maybe Grenoldt would find them inspiring...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Your thoughts turn to Branden, and the crystal you discovered at the end of his journey. Maybe Grenoldt could find inspiration in that...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>Your thoughts turn to Lamitt, and the crystal you discovered at the end of her journey. Maybe Grenoldt could find inspiration in that...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>Your thoughts turn to Renda-Rae, and the crystal you discovered at the end of her journey. Maybe Grenoldt could find inspiration in that...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_064<tab>Your thoughts turn to Nyelbert, and the crystal you discovered at the end of his journey. Maybe Grenoldt could find inspiration in that...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Grenoldt seeks a particular kind of inspiration─the kind that crystallizes only at the culmination of a long and tragic tale.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>Complete any of the role quest lines available at the Wandering Stairs in the Crystarium, then return to Grenoldt once more.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_070<tab>It's no good... I need summat <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var> to light a fire under me piss-sodden imagination.

TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_071<tab>Like...like the spark o' life caught in a crystal. But just bein' sparkly's not enough─it's got to dance with joy an' sorrow an' a sense o' hardship endured... Ye know what I mean!?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Grenoldt seeks a particular kind of inspiration─the kind that crystallizes only at the culmination of a long and tragic tale.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Complete any of the role quest lines available at the Wandering Stairs in the Crystarium, then return to Grenoldt once more.
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_074<tab>I've let the Ondo down, aye... But more'n that I've let <var 1A 02 /var>meself<var 1A 01 /var> down. Might as well go back to mendin' kettles...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_A3_000_000<tab>Show Grenoldt a crystal which once belonged to one of Ardbert's companions?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_075<tab>...Wh-What's that ye've got there!?
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_076<tab>Such strikin' beauty... It shines with heartache an' laughter an' the transience o' life, like the turmoil o' history made manifest!
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_077<tab>Aye, I can see the brilliance o' the crystal's legacy! Ahhh...ye'd never capture such a gleam, not if ye labored a hundred years...
TEXT_LUCKMF107_03650_GRENOLDT_000_078<tab>But bugger me if I don't mean to try! Where're me tools, gods damn ye!? I must set to work before the feelin' fades!
